attributes.action: Significantly reduce Foreign Aid and use that money for the NHS.
attributes.additional_details: Our NHS has been the backbone and pride of our country for over 70 years, it’s time to reward all hardworking staff with pay rises and higher staffing levels. The NHS response during the CoronaVirus crisis must not go ignored.
attributes.background: We would like the Foreign Aid budget significantly slashed in order to increase NHS funding with a view to increase wages across the board of all NHS workers and the complete nullification of car park charges for all staff.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304418

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
